interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pacific Rim (Two-Disc Special Edition DVD) Review Date: 2015/06/03 Store: Charlie Hunnam (Actor), Idris Elba (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Spotlight Deals, Sci-fi & Fantasy Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Pacific Rim (Special Edition) (DVD)', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', "If the prospect of two-plus hours of 250-foot mechanical men pummeling enormous alien creatures from another dimension is just what you've been waiting for, oh, boy, does Guillermo del Toro have a treat for you. The celebrated director--one might even say visionary--has pulled off the most elaborate B-movie heist ever with this huge-budget special effects extravaganza that revels in catchphrase cliché dialogue, a howlingly obvious script, and the most breathtaking homage to Japanese monster and mecha cinema, manga, and comic tradition. It's all by design, of course, and is a stunning spectacle that also acts as antidote to the bloated, self-important superhero genre and typical bombastic Hollywood tent-pole fare.", 'Pacific Rim', 'has plenty of bloat and bombast, mind you. But it\'s in the service of a wondrously geeky story that throws all logic and seriousness to the wind, transporting the viewer to a realm of childlike popcorn escapism no matter their age. A dense and breathless prologue dumps us into the near-future global warfare of Kaiju vs. Jaeger. Kaiju are reptilian monstrosities that emerge from deep in the sea through a portal that leads to a world where Kaijus are systematically bred to destroy. They annihilate coastal cities and claim millions of lives before the world\'s citizens band together to fight back. The humans build fantastic robots called Jaegers (German for fighters) that are able to vanquish the early Kaiju enemies by employing "pilots" who drive the mechanized behemoths in pairs, joining minds in a process known as the Drift. But as the years go by, the war has taken a toll on the humans and the Jaegers, both of whom are nearly defeated. From beginning to end there\'s really no point in asking questions or trying to calculate details about the outrageous goings-on in the world of', 'Pacific Rim', '. This is a pure thrill ride ruled by del Toro, the wild visual flair of his artistry and his sheer delight for wallowing in tropes and genre chestnuts leading at full volume. The cast is mainly window dressing for the astounding computer images. The pilots Charlie Hunnam, Max Martini, Rob Kazinsky, and Rinko Kikuchi are merely types. The same goes for Idris Elba, but his glowering presence as the unwavering commander is the best real-life thing about', 'Pacific Rim', '. A pair of nerdy scientists (Charlie Day and Burn Gorman) add to the plot (simple as it is), though their primary purpose is wacky comic relief. Del Toro favorite and', 'Hellboy', "himself, Ron Perelman steals his few short scenes as a bootlegger in Kaiju corpses. His character says a lot about the movie's self-effacing attitude.", 'Pacific Rim', 'is deeply in cahoots with itself over the ridiculousness of the story, but also delights in the awesomeness of its invention. The action is both coherent and mind-blowing, which is why most people will find it such a kick. Just like driving a Jaeger, throw your head into the battle and hang on. --', 'Ted Fry'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Ultraviolet, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Guillermo del Toro, Burn Gorman, Idris Elba, Clifton Collins Jr., Rob Kazinsky, Max Martini, Thomas Tull, Clifton Collins, Jr., Rinko Kikuchi, Callum Greene, Mary Parent, Ron Perlman, Travis Beacham, Jon Jashni, Charlie Hunnam, Charlie DayGuillermo del Toro, Burn Gorman, Idris Elba, Clifton Collins Jr., Rob Kazinsky, Max Martini, Thomas Tull, Clifton Collins, Jr., Rinko Kikuchi, Callum Greene, Mary Parent, Ron Perlman, Travis Beacham, Jon Jashni, Charlie Hunnam, Charlie Day See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 11 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WHV1000318101DVD', 'Director': 'Guillermo del Toro', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Ultraviolet, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 11 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Charlie Hunnam, Idris Elba, Rinko Kikuchi, Charlie Day, Rob Kazinsky', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Guillermo del Toro, Callum Greene, Thomas Tull, Jon Jashni, Mary Parent', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Writers': 'Travis Beacham, Guillermo del Toro', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Tho this movie has some great old and new actors, I'm afraid it did not meet the Great Scale for me. Some of the effects are pretty good. Others phony.
To me the movie started in the middle of a story and left me wanting to have the First Part so I could really understand Why? And How? It all began.
I bought it. And it was a waste of $$. Please feel free to borrow mine.

DeDe Ga Peaches Review Title: Lemon compared to Ga Peach Cobbler Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Thor [DVD] Chris Hemsworth (Actor), Natalie Portman (Actor), Kenneth Branagh (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['The world has many heroes...but only one is a god. When the arrogant warrior Thor (Chris Hemsworth, STAR TREK) is banished to the Earth from his homeworld of Asgard, he must fight to reclaim his lost powers. Pursued by an invasion force sent to destroy him, the fallen God of Thunder must rise to the battle and learn what it takes to become a true hero. Natalie Portman (BLACK SWAN) and Anthony Hopkins (BEOWULF) also star in the blockbuster adventure critics are calling "thrilling, entertaining and cool" (Harry Knowles, Ain\'t It Cool News).Note: This title does go though a manual rework process.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WD11899700DVD', 'Director': 'Kenneth Branagh', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 24, 2013', 'Actors': 'Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston, Anthony Hopkins, Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'MARVEL', 'Writers': 'Ashley Edward Miller, Zack Stentz, Don Payne, J. Michael Straczynski, Mark Protosevich', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} You could run across your own Super Hero like oh say, Chris Hemsworth! I mean "HELLO", I melt and he's just on a DVD or movie screen or walking down a Red Carpet, wherever makes no difference.

Of course this Thor is the same. Loves his family, his people, all the surrounding planets or in our world, surrounding States and Cities. A true Soldier/Warrior. Respect his parents and even loves his troublesome brother! I have to say I really like this Loki character. Yes he is bad and self enter. But got the attitude of Garfield the Cat and really comical. So yeah I don't think you can have a Thor flick without Loki. Together the brothers compliment each other, tho you wish Loki wasn't so destructive on humankind like he can be. Yes we have romance, anger, some really Ugly bad guys, a crazy Professior and comedy and unfortunately loss of a loved one. So Thor's like us and his home has problems as ours does and we too lose Loved Ones. He just does it with grace and one Heck of a hammer!!
Can't wait for the new Captian America coming to theaters 4/4/14!
Hope you enjoy Thor: The Dark World. Full of action!!
Dezi If only... Dracula Untold Luke Evans (Actor), Sarah Gadon (Actor), Gary Shore (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles ['The origin story of the man who became the enduring legend of Dracula is told in Dracula Untold, an epic action-adventure starring Luke Evans (Fast & Furious 6, The Hobbit series) in the title role. Gary Shore directs, and Michael De Luca produces.'] {'Genre': 'Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance, Gary Shore, Luke Evans', 'Initial release date': '2015-02-03', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MHV61129775DVD', 'Director': 'Gary Shore', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '1 hour and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 3, 2015', 'Actors': 'Luke Evans, Sarah Gadon, Dominic Cooper, Art Parkinson, Charles Dance', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Just watch my Dracula w Luke Evans. First I am a fan of Luke. And he ain't to bad to look at either...know matter the age. LOL
I found the movie extremely interesting and thrilling at the same time.
Vlad the Impaler, his story is tweaked and told in a diffenert way that is...to me a better way of telling the history of such a wicked and Gruesome Dude! Sure glad I was not form that era.
There is Love. There is Honor. There is Family and a bond so strong it can not be broken at all...all the way to the end!
Speaking of the end I did not really care for the ending. Yes it leaves it open for another Dracula...But to me this story does not need a #2. Because it would truly ruin this one!
Yes I Loved the movie. Great effects and dialogue.
I still believe tho that if the ending would have had played out a little bit longer, it would not have left me hanging and finishing the ending for myself' This Drac could bite me anytime! Dezi Ga. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user maintains a strong preference for action and adventure films, particularly those featuring superhero and fantasy elements. They are drawn to engaging stories with dynamic character relationships and emotional resonance.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user seeks well-developed narratives, emphasizing themes of family and loyalty, although their recent review indicates a growing critical perspective towards execution and coherence in filmmaking.

- **Actor and Director Recognition:** While still favoring Luke Evans, the user has explored films featuring actors like Charlie Hunnam and Idris Elba but has shown that not all performances or scripts resonate positively. They appreciate compelling portrayals but are critical of films that lack logical progression.

- **Rating Systems:** The user tends to gravitate toward films with high ratings but is becoming more discerning, highlighting experiences where anticipated quality did not meet expectations.

- **Anticipation of Releases:** Continued enthusiasm for upcoming cinematic releases is evident, alongside a commitment to engaging with the film community.

- **Critical Engagement:** Their latest review reflects a nuanced understanding of narrative structure and character depth, indicating that while they appreciate spectacle and escapism, they also desire meaningful storytelling that provides context to action sequences.

Overall, the user exhibits a passionate yet critical perspective on action-oriented narratives, consistently valuing character development while becoming more discerning about narrative coherence and execution.
